Application.featuresString: AUTHENTICATE, PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, PASSWORD, ENABLE, SEARCH
Application.name: Test Tenant Guest User

AttributeDefinition.name: accountEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: True if the account is enabled; otherwise, false

AttributeDefinition.name: assignedLicenses
AttributeDefinition.Description: The licenses that are assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: assignedPlans
AttributeDefinition.Description: The plans that are assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: city
AttributeDefinition.Description: The city in which the user is located

AttributeDefinition.name: country
AttributeDefinition.Description: The country/region in which the user is located

AttributeDefinition.name: department
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name for the department in which the user works

AttributeDefinition.name: dirSyncEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether this object was synced from the on-premises directory

AttributeDefinition.name: disabledPlans
AttributeDefinition.Description: The plans that are not assigned to user

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name displayed in the address book for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: facsimileTelephoneNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The telephone number of the user's business fax machine

AttributeDefinition.name: givenName
AttributeDefinition.Description: First name of user

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Groups assigned to a user

AttributeDefinition.name: appRoleAssignments
AttributeDefinition.Description: Application roles assigned to a user

AttributeDefinition.name: immutableId
AttributeDefinition.Description: This property is used to associate an on-premises ActiveDirectory user account to their Microsoft Entra ID user object

AttributeDefinition.name: jobTitle
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's job title

AttributeDefinition.name: lastDirSyncTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the last time at which the object was synced with the on-premises directory

AttributeDefinition.name: mail
AttributeDefinition.Description: The SMTP address for the user, for example, "john@contoso.onmicrosoft.com"

AttributeDefinition.name: mailNickname
AttributeDefinition.Description: The mail alias for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: signInNames
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the collection of sign-in names for a local account in an Azure Active Directory B2C tenant

AttributeDefinition.name: userIdentities
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the collection of userIdentities for a social user account in an Azure Active Directory B2C tenant

AttributeDefinition.name: creationType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user account is a local account for an Azure Active Directory B2C tenant

AttributeDefinition.name: mobile
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary cellular telephone number for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: objectId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: onPremisesSecurityIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: Contains the on-premises security identifier (SID) for the user that was synchronized from on-premises to the cloud

AttributeDefinition.name: otherMails
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of additional email addresses for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: passwordPolicies
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies password policies for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: physicalDeliveryOfficeName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The office location in the user's place of business

AttributeDefinition.name: postalCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: The ZIP OR postal code for the user's postal address

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Preferred written or spoken language for a person

AttributeDefinition.name: proxyAddresses
AttributeDefinition.Description: Proxy addresses, for example: ["SMTP: bob@contoso.com", "smtp: bob@sales.contoso.com"]

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Administrator Role assigned to user

AttributeDefinition.name: sipProxyAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the voice over IP (VOIP) session initiation protocol (SIP) address for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: state
AttributeDefinition.Description: The state or province in the user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: streetAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: The street address of the user's place of business

AttributeDefinition.name: surname
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last name of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: telephoneNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary telephone number of the user's place of business

AttributeDefinition.name: usageLocation
AttributeDefinition.Description: A two letter country code indicating usage location

AttributeDefinition.name: userPrincipalName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user principal name (UPN) of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: userType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Type of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: manager
AttributeDefinition.Description: Manager of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: riskLevel
AttributeDefinition.Description: Level of the detected risky user

AttributeDefinition.name: riskState
AttributeDefinition.Description: State of the user's risk

AttributeDefinition.name: riskDetail
AttributeDefinition.Description: Details of the detected risk

AttributeDefinition.name: riskLastUpdatedDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date and time that the risky user was last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: channels
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of channel membership of a user

AttributeDefinition.name: azureEligibleRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Azure Eligible Roles

AttributeDefinition.name: azureActiveRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Azure Active Roles

AttributeDefinition.name: azureADEligibleRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Microsoft Entra ID Eligible Roles

AttributeDefinition.name: azureADActiveRoles
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Microsoft Entra ID Active Roles

AttributeDefinition.name: accessPackages
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of Access Packages assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Eligible Role Display Name

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Microsoft Entra ID Eligible Role ID

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether role is custom or built-in

AttributeDefinition.name: roleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the role

AttributeDefinition.name: scope
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope at which role can be assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name for the application role

AttributeDefinition.name: spn_description
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description of service principal

AttributeDefinition.name: appRole_description
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description of application role

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier for the application role

AttributeDefinition.name: allowedMemberTypes
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allowed member types for application role

AttributeDefinition.name: isEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: States whether the application role is enabled or not

AttributeDefinition.name: value
AttributeDefinition.Description: Value of the application role

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: The description for the Microsoft Entra ID role

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name for the Microsoft Entra ID role

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The unique identifier for the Microsoft Entra ID role

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag indicating whether the role is part of the default set included in Microsoft Entra ID or a custom role

AttributeDefinition.name: isEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag indicating whether the role is enabled for assignment. If false the role is not available for assignment

AttributeDefinition.name: rolePermissions
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of permissions included in the role

AttributeDefinition.name: objectId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier for the service plan which is a combination of skuId and servicePlanId separated by colon (:).

AttributeDefinition.name: skuId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier (GUID) for the License Pack.

AttributeDefinition.name: skuPartNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: The SKU part number of the License Pack. For example, AAD_PREMIUM.

AttributeDefinition.name: appliesTo
AttributeDefinition.Description: Object types to which the license pack can be assigned. For example: User, Company.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name of service plan which is a combination of skuPartNumber and servicePlanName separated by colon (:).

AttributeDefinition.name: servicePlanId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier of the service plan.

AttributeDefinition.name: servicePlanName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The name of the service plan.

AttributeDefinition.name: provisioningStatus
AttributeDefinition.Description: The provisioning status of the service plan.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Microsoft Entra ID Role Display Name

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Microsoft Entra ID Active Role ID

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether role is custom or built-in

AttributeDefinition.name: roleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the role

AttributeDefinition.name: scope
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope at which role can be assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique identifier of the Access Package.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name made by combining Access Package name and Policy name.

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description of the Access Package.

AttributeDefinition.name: policyDescription
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description of the Access Package's policy.

AttributeDefinition.name: expiration
AttributeDefinition.Description: Expiration time for the Access Package's policy.

AttributeDefinition.name: isHidden
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the Access Package is hidden from end users on My Access portal.

AttributeDefinition.name: catalog
AttributeDefinition.Description: Container where the Access Package resides.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name of the channel

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: Decription of the channel

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: The channel's unique identifier

AttributeDefinition.name: email
AttributeDefinition.Description: Email address of the channel

AttributeDefinition.name: webUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: Hyperlink of the channel

AttributeDefinition.name: membershipType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Type of the channel

AttributeDefinition.name: owners
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of owners of the private channel

AttributeDefinition.name: createdDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Creation timestamp of the channel

AttributeDefinition.name: isFavoriteByDefault
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the channel should automatically be marked 'favorite' for all members of the team

AttributeDefinition.name: teamEmail
AttributeDefinition.Description: The email address of the parent team

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Active Role Display Name

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Azure Active Role ID

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether role is custom or built-in

AttributeDefinition.name: roleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the role

AttributeDefinition.name: scope
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope at which role can be assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Eligible Role Display Name

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: Azure Eligible Role ID

AttributeDefinition.name: isBuiltIn
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether role is custom or built-in

AttributeDefinition.name: roleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the role

AttributeDefinition.name: scope
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope at which role can be assigned

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: dirSyncEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether this object was synced from the on-premises directory.

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: groupTypes
AttributeDefinition.Description: Type of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: lastDirSyncTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the last time at which the object was synced with the on-premises directory

AttributeDefinition.name: mail
AttributeDefinition.Description: The SMTP address for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: mailEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether the group is mail-enabled

AttributeDefinition.name: mailNickname
AttributeDefinition.Description: The mail alias for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: objectId
AttributeDefinition.Description: Group ID

AttributeDefinition.name: onPremisesSecurityIdentifier
AttributeDefinition.Description: Contains the on-premises security identifier (SID) for the group that was synchronized from on-premises to the cloud

AttributeDefinition.name: proxyAddresses
AttributeDefinition.Description: Proxy addresses of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: securityEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether the group is a security group

AttributeDefinition.name: teamsEnabled
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies whether teams has been enabled for the group

AttributeDefinition.name: owners
AttributeDefinition.Description: Owners of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: memberOf
AttributeDefinition.Description: Group Membership
